# realUserStatus

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates whether the user appears to be a real person.

## Declaration

```swift
var realUserStatus: ASUserDetectionStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property’s value as one piece of data when trying to prevent fraud. A value of [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASUserDetectionStatus/likelyReal] is a hint that the system has a reasonably high confidence that the user is a real person, as opposed to an automated agent, but this isn’t a guarantee.

## Detecting User Characteristics

- **ASUserDetectionStatus**: Possible values for the real user indicator.
